name(The Milky Way)

snap(-60,-50,-40)
sky(10,10,50)
fog(100,255,255)
ground(10,10,50)
polys(10,10,50)
fadefrom(8000)
density(4)
nlaps(3)
lightson()

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
set(10,0,28000,0)
set(10,0,33600,0)
set(12,1520,39230,-30)p
set(10,3040,44860,0)p
set(10,3040,50460,0)p
chk(40,3040,50000,0)
set(10,3040,56060,0)
set(31,3040,62169,0)
set(10,3040,78460,0)
set(30,3040,72351,180)pl
set(10,3040,84060,0)p
set(14,3040,88610,0)
chk(40,3040,86860,0)
set(10,7590,88610,-90)p
set(14,12140,88610,-90)pt
set(10,12140,84060,0)p
set(10,12140,78460,0)
set(31,12140,72351,180)
chk(40,12140,76435,0)
set(10,12140,56060,180)
set(30,12140,62169,0)pl
set(10,12140,50460,180)p
set(10,12140,44860,180)
set(12,10620,39230,-30)p
set(10,9100,33600,0)p
chk(40,9100,33000,0)
set(10,9100,28000,0)
set(10,9100,5600,180)
set(10,9100,0,180)
chk(40,9100,-2800,0)
set(10,9100,-5600,0)p
set(14,9100,-10150,180)pt
set(10,4550,-10150,-90)p
set(14,0,-10150,90)pt
set(10,0,-5600,180)p
set(30,0,21891,180)pl
set(31,0,11709,0)pr
set(31,9100,21891,180)
set(30,9100,11709,0)pl
set(23,13028,16626,90)po
set(10,10228,16626,-90)p
set(26,6828,16626,90)
set(10,4628,16626,-90)p
fix(41,4516,16626,-1300,90)s
set(26,1828,16626,-90)
set(10,-972,16626,-90)p
set(23,-3772,16626,-90)po

maxl(22,-7084,-11170)
maxb(5,-13570,-4684)
maxr(22,16916,-11170)
maxt(5,92030,-4684)
